page.title: 01A General Summary
page.content: Our D block is a rural area.It is mainly farmland and North Leigh is the largest village.North Leigh is a country village in Oxfordshire.It lies north east of Witney and has a population of approximately 2000 people.It has not got many facilites. There is a supermarket, a Post Office and a garage in New Yatt, which is one mile away from the centre of North Leigh.The supermarket has two petrol pumps outside it. There are about 400 houses in North Leigh. At the back of the supermarket there is an old broken down windmill which is about 200 years old.Behind the windmill there are some allotments.Every first Tuesday of the month a newsletter is issued it is called the Nor'Lye News.It tells local people what is going on in certain institutions.{Turn to next page}
